modName: Mirage - Racemenu Preset with UUNP Bodyslide - DELETED
summary: Mirage is a Racemenu preset of my new character, with whom is a forest goblin. There's also an UUNP Bodyslide to fit along the preset.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][center][b][size=2][img]https://i.imgur.com/cRpVntp.jpg[/img][/size][/b][/center][/size]"Mirage was born from the breath of Kyne in Valenwood under the two moons close to Strid River, where vines wither and a waterfall flows into a lost ravine of the spriggans. She was to be watched over until the day came where her destiny would unfold. Many years later, naked and unconscious, she was found below the Shrine of Akatosh by two hunters and brought to Falkreath, where she woke and walked, as the World Eater took flight on the wave of time once again."




[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/FJwDmAU.jpg[/img]﻿[/center]
[center]Prior to uploading 1.0, I had another file that had noted changes in 2.0, which are displayed
in all of the photos I've posted.

[u]Here's a list of what 2.0 has packed[/u]:
• Height slider set to 8.2 from 8.4.
• I made slight changes to her ears.
• I wanted her lip color to blend better with her complexion.
• Eyeliner and shadow adjusted around her eyes.[/center]



[center][/center][center]﻿[img]https://i.imgur.com/T9TzRbx.jpg[/img]

You can find links under credits to the designers and developers.


[color=#93c47d][b]Download Mirage[/b] [b]Installers[/b][/color]
• Mirage - Racemenu Preset

• Mirage - Plump Bodyslide Preset (UUNP)
[i]or[/i]
• Mirage - Plump Bodyslide Preset (UUNP) (Less Perky Nips)
[i]or
[/i]• Mirage - Plump Bodyslide Preset (UUNP) (Even Less Perky Nips)

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#93c47d][b]Mods Needed For Customization

[/b][/color]• [u]Install[/u]: DIMONIZED UNP female body﻿ (or variant).
﻿
• [u]Install[/u]: Fair Skin Complexion (UNP)
* I use Optimized, but the other UNP one should be fine.
* Use all assets: body textures, brows, eyes, etc.

• [u]Install[/u]: SG Female Textures Renewal, plus Options (install after main file).
* UNP Textures (Main File) -> 2K/4k No Scar Textures -> Smooth Body Textures

• [u]Install[/u]: KS Hairdos Renewal
• [u]Install[/u]: The Eyes Of Beauty
• [u]Install[/u]: Brows
• [u]Install[/u]: Ravens Warpaint (Standalone 11-13)
• [u]Install[/u]: The Coenaculi
[u][/u]• [u]Install[/u]: Freckle Mania 1

• Set up Mirage Plump in Bodyslider before clicking the play button, if you want to use it.
* I do recommend it, as I made it to go with her Racemenu preset.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________

[b][color=#93c47d]In-Game[/color][/b]
• Set your character's race to Breton.
• Load up the Mirage preset.
* Her height is set to 8.2 in version 2.0.
* Her height is set to 8.4 in version 1.0.
﻿



[img]https://i.imgur.com/QvNakE1.jpg[/img]

Without these wonderful people, making their assets available, we designers wouldn't exist to make presets (or simply design a
character for the next screenshot). A big thank you to all of them. I was inspired by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85644]Of Goblins and Men[/url]﻿ by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13953660]shidoni1[/url]. Lastly, I think
we all must thank Bethseda and Nexusmods for making this all possible, because without them, we wouldn't be here.

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2950481]expired6978[/url] | [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/]Racemenu[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686]Caliente[/url] | [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/]Bodyslide and Outfit Studio[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/537675]dimon99[/url] |[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/] DIMONIZED UNP female body[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4557236]HHaleyy[/url] | [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2209393]hellosanta[/url] | [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4559665]Kalilies[/url] | [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdos - Renewal[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/308756]LogRaam[/url] | [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/30027]lthot[/url] | [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411]Brows[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3240173]t56yr[/url] | [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45641]Ravens Warpaint[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5075883]Desufire[/url] | [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35677]The Coenaculi[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/981329]tetrodoxin[/url] | [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/]Freckle Mania
[/url]
[u]Other Assets and Tools Used[/u]:
Goma Pero Land
Abandoned Temple
Bend Time
Face Light
DYNAVISION - Dynamic Depth of Field
﻿Halo’s Poser S1.7
HaloPublicPoser
Immersive Animated Poses
Immersive Masturbation Animations
Puppeteer Master

[u]Clothing Used In Some Pictures[/u]:[u]
[/u]Sexy Swimsuit and bikinis for CBBE + UUNP Bodyslide Patch
Lind's Woodland Alchemist Dress + UUNP Bodyslide Patch




[img]https://i.imgur.com/QmilKkA.jpg[/img]

[size=2]1. [u]Will Mirage become a follower in the future?
[/u]I would like her to become a follower. I'm currently looking into the possibility of this becoming reality, hopefully gaining
permission to use assets that makeup her preset.[/size]


[size=2]2. [u]Blocky shadows in pictures. No ENB used?[/u]
ENBs (and even Tropical Skyrim/Purity) are a lifesaver for breathing color into a grey palette world like Skyrim. I didn't use
one in this case, because for one, I was testing out certain tools, well as wanting to capture her in a normal environment. Feel
free to upload your own pictures![/size]

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________


[size=2]• Do not create a follower mod of Mirage and upload it to Nexusmods or elsewhere. If I feel that a follower is to be of her, then
I'll post it on Nexusmods myself and only here, going through the correct channels.[/size]

[size=2]• Permission is given to use my Mirage Preset and Mirage Plump Bodyslides for your personal appearance only, well as any
images taken of Mirage by me, posted on this page. If you want to craft yourself your own Mirage follower, for YOUR use
only, then that's fine. If you would like to use the Mirage Plump Bodyslide for another follower of yours, then all I ask is
to credit me and everything will be fine from there. You don't have to ask me to use it. Otherwise, personal use only as stated.
Do not upload the Mirage Plump Bodyslide with your follower installation, either, please. Link the user here.

[size=2]• [/size]Uploading the Mirage Preset and Plump Bodyslide to other avenues is prohibited, well as trying to make any sort of income.
The Mirage Preset and Mirage Plump Bodyslide will only exist on Nexusmods, Forever Free, as it should be.

[size=2][size=2]• [/size][/size]Any imagery with text on it, shown in the header or on this description page, isn't to be used for your own work — its for this page only.[/size][/center]
